TEXT.TITLE: INTER-TEL INC <INTLA.O> 2ND QTR MAY 31 NET

    Avg shares 7,933,000 vs 8,553,000
    Six Months

    NOTE: Qtr includes extraordinary gain of 125,000 dlrs, or
